channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【I can use WM_COPYDATA to send a block of data to another window, but how does it send data back?】我可以使用 WM_COPYDATA 将数据块发送到另一个窗口，但它如何将数据发送回？
item.description: 【The WM_COPY­DATA message can be used to send a blob of data from one window to another. The window manager does the work of copying the data from the sending process to the receiving process, but how does the receiving process send data back? If the only information that needs to come back is a success/failure,】WM_COPYDATA 消息可用于将大量数据从一个窗口发送到另一个窗口。窗口管理器所做的工作就是将数据从发送进程复制到接收进程，但是接收进程如何将数据发送回来呢？如果唯一需要返回的信息是成功/失败，

item.title: 【Azure MCP Server Now Built-In with Visual Studio 2026: A New Era for Agentic Workflows】Azure MCP 服务器现已内置于 Visual Studio 2026：代理工作流的新时代
item.description: 【Managing cloud resources often means juggling multiple tools, writing custom scripts, and switching contexts between your IDE and cloud management portals. These extra steps slow development and make it harder to build intelligent, secure applications efficiently. We’re excited to announce that】管理云资源通常意味着使用多种工具、编写自定义脚本以及在 IDE 和云管理门户之间切换上下文。这些额外的步骤会减慢开发速度，并使高效构建智能、安全的应用程序变得更加困难。我们很高兴地宣布

item.title: 【Tutorial Videos: Setting up GitHub Copilot for your Company】教程视频：为您的公司设置 GitHub Copilot
item.description: 【This guide shares a series of videos that walk you through setting up GitHub and GitHub Copilot end-to-end for your company. These are especially useful for organizations starting from scratch who want to leverage GitHub Copilot and are looking to get started. These videos were recorded as of October 2025.】本指南分享了一系列视频，引导您为您的公司完成端到端设置 GitHub 和 GitHub Copilot。这些对于从头开始、想要利用 GitHub Copilot 并希望开始使用的组织特别有用。这些视频是截至 2025 年 10 月录制的。

item.title: 【OpenAPI.NET: The Biggest Update Ever】OpenAPI.NET：有史以来最大的更新
item.description: 【Announcing the Biggest Update Ever: OpenAPI.NET v2 & v3 We are excited to announce two major releases of the OpenAPI.NET library—the most significant update since its launch in 2018. These updates ensure developers can build and document modern, interoperable APIs with the latest OpenAPI specifications.】宣布有史以来最大的更新：OpenAPI.NET v2 和 v3 我们很高兴地宣布 OpenAPI.NET 库的两个主要版本，这是自 2018 年推出以来最重要的更新。这些更新确保开发人员可以使用最新的 OpenAPI 规范构建和记录现代的、可互操作的 API。

item.title: 【Python in Visual Studio Code - November 2025 Release】Visual Studio Code 中的 Python - 2025 年 11 月发布
item.description: 【We're excited to announce that the November 2025 release of the Python extension for Visual Studio Code is now available! This release includes the following announcements: Add Copilot Hover Summaries as docstring Localized Copilot Ho】我们很高兴地宣布，2025 年 11 月发布的 Visual Studio Code Python 扩展现已推出！此版本包括以下公告： 添加 Copilot 悬停摘要作为文档字符串 本地化的 Copilot Ho

item.title: 【A first look at the all‑new UX in Visual Studio 2026】抢先一睹 Visual Studio 2026 中的全新 UX
item.description: 【Visual Studio 2026 introduces a refreshed user experience, thoughtfully crafted for clarity, accessibility, and a clean interface that feels right at home on Windows. This update is the result of extensive collaboration with developers and incorporates valuable feedback from the community. We’ve improved typography, iconography, and the over】Visual Studio 2026 引入了全新的用户体验，经过精心设计，清晰度、可访问性和干净的界面在 Windows 上感觉就像在家里一样。此更新是与开发人员广泛合作的结果，并纳入了社区的宝贵反馈。我们改进了版式、图像等等

item.title: 【Could we use CTAD to simplify the use of WRL's Callback function?】我们是否可以使用CTAD来简化WRL的Callback函数的使用？
item.description: 【Commenter Bwmat asked, "Can CTAD avoid the need for the lengthy type name in the last example?" This was in response to the rather lengthy type in the explicit specialization void MyClass::RegisterCompletion(ABI::IAsy】评论者 Bwmat 问道：“CTAD 能否避免上一个示例中使用冗长的类型名称？”这是为了响应显式专业化 void MyClass::RegisterCompletion(ABI::IAsy

item.title: 【Ensuring Seamless User Experience in Modernization Projects with AI‑Generated Stagehand and Playwright UI Tests】通过人工智能生成的舞台工作人员和剧作家 UI 测试确保现代化项目中的无缝用户体验
item.description: 【When modernizing legacy systems, the user interface often becomes the make-or-break factor for project success. While backend improvements matter, users interact with the frontend and that's where trust is built or broken. Using AI‑generated tools like Stagehand with Microsoft's Playwright helps ensure a smooth user experience during moderni】在对遗留系统进行现代化改造时，用户界面通常成为项目成功与否的决定因素。虽然后端改进很重要，但用户与前端交互是建立或破坏信任的地方。将 Stagehand 等人工智能生成的工具与 Microsoft 的 Playwright 结合使用，有助于确保现代剧中流畅的用户体验

item.title: 【Perform wide-sweeping refactors using C++ code editing tools for GitHub Copilot】使用 GitHub Copilot 的 C++ 代码编辑工具执行广泛的重构
item.description: 【[cta-button text="Sign up for our Private Preview" url="https://aka.ms/code-editing-tools-private-preview" color="btn-primary" align="center"] Refactoring a C++ codebase can often require tracking updates across various sections of multiple files to ensure accuracy and relevancy. Historically, developers have relied on manual searches acr】[cta-button text="注册我们的私人预览版" url="https://aka.ms/code-editing-tools-private-preview" color="btn-primary"align="center"] 重构 C++ 代码库通常需要跟踪多个文件的各个部分的更新，以确保准确性和相关性。 从历史上看，开发人员一直依赖手动搜索 acr

item.title: 【Optimize Your C++ Build Times with GitHub Copilot】使用 GitHub Copilot 优化您的 C++ 构建时间
item.description: 【Long build times are one of the top pain points for C++ projects. If you’ve ever waited too long for a C++ build to finish, you know how much it can slow down your productivity. In past years, we introduced C++ Build Insights to help you analyze traces and find bottlenecks. However, we know that】构建时间长是 C++ 项目的最大痛点之一。如果您曾经等待 C++ 构建完成太长时间，您就会知道它会降低您的工作效率。在过去几年中，我们引入了 C++ Build Insights 来帮助您分析跟踪并查找瓶颈。然而，我们知道
